mapper.select: select device_id as deviceId,tag_name as tagName,push_type as pushType, push_msg as pushMsg,update_time as updateTime,push_model as pushModel,is_use as isUse,is_del as isDel from m_app_push_log where push_id=#{pushId} limit 1
SELECT user_id as userId,o_id as organId FROM m_user WHERE device_id=#{deviceId} limit 1
select push_user_tag_id as pushUserTagId from m_app_push_user_tag where user_id=#{userId} and device_id=#{deviceId} limit 1
select push_id as pushId from m_app_push_log where push_model=#{pushModel} and push_id=#{pushId} and device_id=#{deviceId} limit 1
select registration_id as registrationId from m_app_push_registration_id where device_id=#{deviceId} order by add_time DESC limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into m_app_push_registration_id ( device_id, registration_id, add_time ) VALUES ( #{deviceId}, #{registrationId}, NOW() )
mapper.select: select is_success as isSuccess from m_app_push_user_tag where registration_id=#{registrationId} and device_id=#{deviceId} order by add_time limit 1
